Articles.Content:
1) I have scaned mun and there are really lot of resources- ore , mineral , water, hydrates,uranite, metalic ore...

can i use them all ? from what can i make fuel ?

2)why i need polar orbit when scanning?

3) i build a rover and  IVA :

 and from EVA :  

where is the problem ?

ps : why is the pictures so big ? How to make them smaller ?

Edited March 29, 2016 by Penkover

1. Only Ore is usable in stock. Other resources are potentially usable by mods. In stock you use drills (large or small) to dig ore, and use ISRU (also large or small) to convert ore to LF/Ox/monoprop

2. A polar orbit with an orbital not a rational multiple of a sidereal day will eventually fly on top of all the area of the planet. If you have ever used ScanSat/Kethane, you'll see how such polar orbit satellite sweeps every (square) inch of the planet. For the sake of simplicity and removal of annoyance, the design of stock scanning becomes an instant scanning after establishing a reasonable polar orbit.

As far as the rover, did you clip anything into the body from the top?

Looks like something is overhanging the internal view and blocking the upper part of the window.

As far as making the pictures smaller that'd depend on what image upload site you are using? I usually just put them under a spoiler tag.

Spoiler

Then you only see them if you want to.

On 25. 3. 2016 at 1:47 PM, FancyMouse said:

 Other resources are potentially usable by mods.

What mods and how ? I have mod near future elctrical and i can make eriched uranium from normal ore.

On 25. 3. 2016 at 1:51 PM, Rocket In My Pocket said:

As far as the rover, did you clip anything into the body from the top?

Looks like something is overhanging the internal view and blocking the upper part of the window.

 

Nothing blocking sight outdoor.

Before  i have another rover with same command pod and same problem. propably some bug.
